name: 吳和庭
objective: 本課程介紹連續時間與離散時間訊號與系統的基本概念。訊號與系統的分析廣泛地應用在模擬、分析、與設計實際物理過程。本課程可做為線性系統、通訊系統與數位訊號處理等較進階課程之基礎課程。授課內容大綱如下：1.訊號與系統簡介2.線性非時變系統3.週期訊號之傅立葉級數表示法4.連續時間訊號與系統的傅立葉分析5.離散時間訊號與系統的傅立葉分析6.取樣7.調變8.濾波9.拉普拉斯變換10.Z變換
schedule:
Prerequisite: Calculus, Complex Analysis
Schedule:
Week 1.　　Introduction
Week 2.　　Descriptions and Properties of Continuous-Time Systems
Week 3.　　Descriptions and Properties of Discrete-Time Systems
Week 4.　　Time-Domain Analysis of Continuous-Time Systems
Week 5.　　Time-Domain Analysis of Discrete -Time Systems
Week 6.　　Midterm 1; Fourier Series Representations for
                    Continuous-Time Signals
Week 7.　　Fourier Series Representations for Continuous-Time Signals
Weeks 8-9.   Fourier Series Representations for Discrete-Time Signals
Weeks 10-11. The continuous-time Fourier Transform.
Week 12.　　    Midterm 2; The Discrete-time Fourier Transform.
Week 13.     The Discrete-time Fourier Transform.
Weeks 14-15. Sampling and the Discrete Fourier Transform
Week 16.     The Z-Transform
Week 17.     The Laplace Transform
Week 18.     Final Exam
